channel.title: Help with stackable, untradable and tradeable items
channel.description:
Well I need someone to explain how to make items, stackable, untradable and tradeable.
Well in my data folder, I found .dat files which when I open are boxes... Font problems maybe ?
But umm, yeah if someone could give me a tutorial * EXPLAINING * how to do it, I'd be very grateful.
Thanks
EDIT:
Also, if I made rune arrows stackable, they'd appear stacked when fired correct ?

item.title: Help with stackable, untradable and tradeable items

more than me
thanks for that i wanted to make some items untradeable, now i can

item.title: Help with stackable, untradable and tradeable items
item.dc:creator: @D_D_3 D D 3
item.description:
@D_D_3 wrote:

Well I only know how to make thing’s undertradable so far lol :S

Open up client.java and search for public int untradable[] then just add the item id at the very last item id you have in there.

Save+ Compile
Done

Read full topic
item.source: Help with stackable, untradable and tradeable items
